question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term best refers to sources that give verifiable factual information or explain some aspect of the biological, social, or physical world?
description: The image is a cover of the "National Geographic Kids Almanac 2011." The cover features a vibrant yellow background with various elements related to nature and wildlife. Prominently displayed in the center is an image of a jaguar, surrounded by smaller circular images showcasing different animals and natural phenomena, such as a bird, a volcano erupting, and a dolphin jumping out of the water. The text on the cover includes phrases like "Celebrate," "Everything," "More Than 500 Incredible Photos," and "Awesome Animals." The National Geographic logo is also visible at the top left corner of the cover.
